text: It’d be nice to have a class on the device preview iframes similar to the `hs-inline-edit` class. Something like `hs-editor-preview`. Auto download links have been creating a glitchy editing experience when clients go to “preview” the page on the phone and device iframes
I saw the newly added `HubDB row` field, that is a great addition. It would be nice if the HubDB option could be changed from the page editor. It would increase the usability of this module.
